users.error deleting account: Tineurombo, panga paita dambudziko kuno kwatiri. Edza zvakare kana kuti nyorera kuTsigiro.

bible versions.title: Mhando yeBhaibheri
bible versions.audio bible meta: Teerera Bhaibheri richiverengwa mahara kana tora App yeBhaibheri woteerera pafoni yako ne App yeBhaibheri yemandorokwati.

marketing.plans copy: Zvirongwa zveBhaibheri zvinokubatsira iwe kubatana neShoko raMwari mazuva ose, zvishoma nezvishoma.
marketing.download app copy: Makumi emamiriyoni evanhu arikushandisa Bhaiberi App kuti vaverenge nekushandisa Shoko raMwari mazuva ose. Tora mahara kuti uone pawakabata, zvawakanyora nezvirongwa zvekuverenga zvaka. Unokwanisa kuona zvese izvi kwese kwese. Pane mavhezheni mazana nemazana uye kuverengerwa. Zvese izvi unokwanisa kuzviwana pamuchina wako.
marketing.verse action copy: Chinyorwa kana Kubata vesi yaunofarira,unokwanisa kugadzira mapikicha emavesi auno kwanisa kupavame, nekubatanidza neZvinyorwa zvemuBhaiberi
marketing.versions copy: Select any Bible verse or passage, linked directly to any of YouVersionâ€™s 1,200+ versions, in 900+ languages. People viewing your Event can tap your reference to see it in their Bible App reader, where they can Bookmark it, Highlight it, and more.
marketing.download or read: Tutunura izvezvi kana kuti verenga uri padandemutande.
